_source.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
_source.long_desc: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.
_source.pricing_details: SimplePractice offers three plans, the Start Plan for $29 per month, the Essential Plan starting at $69 per month and the Plus Plan starting at $99 per month.  Visit simplepractice.com/pricing to see what features are available in each plan.
_source.target_audience: Health and wellness practitioners in private practice including therapists, psychologists, speech-language pathologists, occupational therapists, dietitians, massage therapists and many more.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time and keep your patients organized with Acuity's HIPAA-compliant, self-service scheduling solution. From the moment a patient schedules an appointment with you, Acuity sends customized confirmations, delivers text reminders, stores SOAP notes, lets patients reschedule based on your availability, and processes payments. You can even set up video conferencing, so you can interface with your patients remotely. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly!

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR/EHR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features & reports. Easy to use. Free to try.
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD!!! Top Choice for Practice Management! We make running your practice EASY, ORGANIZED and SECURE. Try Us Free!
related_products.features: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD By Capterra!!! Top Choice for Practice Management!  Personalized. Efficient. Complete. Online practice management exactly the way you want it. Offering live online chat & video sessions, custom questionnaires & forms, email messaging, scheduling and calendar, billing and invoicing, treatment plans, and more. Try Us Today to see if you like it as much as our current members do!! Now offering 14 Day Free Trial! (No credit card required).

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono cloud-based mobile EHR with PM includes live claims feed, real time eligibility checks, custom templates and appt reminders.
related_products.features: DrChrono's all-in-one cloud-based mobile EHR comes with speech-to-text and custom templates/forms to chart effectively. With DrChrono's practice management and medical billing software you get a live claims feed for billing and payment processing, HCFA/Superbill generation, and e-fax integration. Real-time eligibility checks help you check patients' information, and you can send custom appointment reminders through email, SMS, or phone. For students please visit DrChrono University.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize the patient care experience for behavior & mental health patients with RXNT's cloud-based Practice Management and EHR systems.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based healthcare software optimizes the behavioral and mental health patient care experience. Increase productivity and improve RCM with the integrated PM system, and streamline your practice workflows with the certified EHR solution. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care. 'Smart' keys and forms enhance customization and eliminate redundancy for maximum efficiency. And, single sign-on (SSO) simplifies operations for multiple locations.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Health Record (EHR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Therasoft Practice Management with integrated Teletherapy. Mobile apps with secure video and payments for Client & Therapist.
related_products.features: Switch to Therasoft. The Practice management platform starting at $69 a month per therapist. $99 per month for unlimited electronic claims and ERAs. Struggling with your UNPAID CLAIMS? Try our Receivables Management service. Ask about our Telehealth Bundle with Marketing, Management, Clinical and Billing - all-in-one COMPREHENSIVE package. A professional website. Secure Video. Credit card processing. Mobile Apps for Clinicians and clients in  Android & iOS. ePrescribe available for psychiatrists

related_products.short_desc: Our electronic medical records, practice management and billing software is especially designed to meet mental health provider's needs.
related_products.features: Enhance patient care with InSync's fully integrated, easy-to-use, cloud-based healthcare IT solutions. Customizable workflows and dashboards, group therapy, patient portal, integrated scheduling, billing, and e-prescribing, integrated telemedicine and mobile ready.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based Mental Health practice management software with electronic claims processing - the most user-friendly solution available.
similar_products.features: Kareo web-based EMR & medical billing software for Mental Health practices with integrated e-claims processing is the most user-friendly and easy set-up solution on the market. With non-physician provider pricing starting at $80, there's no reason not to join 75,000 providers using Kareo. With Kareo you can schedule appointments, verify insurance eligibility, send e-claims, receive e-insurance payments, manage collections, store documents online, and print custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve clinical outcomes, increase your efficiency, and run a more profitable practice with Valant's Behavioral Health EHR Software.
similar_products.features: Valant's Behavioral Health EHR enables you to provide exceptional care and run a successful practice. Valant is designed to increase your administrative and clinical efficiency. With built-in outcome measures, billing, reporting, e-prescribing, telehealth, payment processing, patient engagement, and clinical documentation tools, your practice will upgrade the quality and efficiency of practice. Offer seamless medication management, psychotherapy, group counseling sessions, and more with Valant.

similar_products.short_desc: AZZLY Rize is an all-in-one addiction treatment and behavioral healthcare EHR/RCM solution, for small, medium, and large organizations.
similar_products.features: AZZLY Rize is a top-rated addiction treatment and behavioral healthcare-specific EHR, Telehealth Ready and RCM system. We serve small, medium, and large organizations. Rize is very customizable and scalable. Features include e-check-in, scheduling, appointment reminder, EHR, treatment plans, progress notes, outcome measurement tools, medication management, withdrawal management, e-prescribing, EPCS, PDMP, patient communication tools, and electronic billing and claims submission.

similar_products.short_desc: TheraPlatform is a HIPAA-compliant EMR, practice management and telehealth platform designed for mental health providers and therapists
similar_products.features:
TheraPlatform is All-in One HIPPA compliant EMR, practice management and Telehealth platform for mental health providers. 
Streamline your practice with our comprehensive features: scheduling, documentation, paperless intake/consent forms; note templates; Wiley treatment planners, billing; e-claims, client portal; Free built- in Telehealth with built- in whiteboard, screen-sharing, resource library and more. 
Get paid faster with Auto-Pay and Auto-Claim!

Start 30-Day Free Trail (no CC needed)!

similar_products.short_desc: Apricot is a secure, flexible, and easy-to-use case management solution for nonprofits of any size.
similar_products.features: Develop individual plans to ensure your clients are getting the correct treatment and work collaboratively to refer clients between programs for optimum care. Meanwhile, meet funding requirements and measure your overall progress towards organizational goals and outcomes. Our software ensures you can manage and report on the services you offer in one easy-to-use tool.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one behavioral health EHR and practice management system keeps things consistent between patient care and business operations.
similar_products.features: NextGen Healthcare integrates behavioral, physical, and oral health data on a single platform for a comprehensive view of patient health. The goal: a whole-person approach to care. Configurable workflows and reports, as well as telehealth solutions and a smart digital pen, promote clinical flexibility, improve care coordination, and enhance patient access. In our commitment to elevate behavioral healthcare, our fully integrated solutions help reduce administrative and clinical errors.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

Typically Medical Transcription software provides automation tools facilitating fast and accurate transcriptions along with process oriented functions that allow efficient, accurate record management. Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.

_source.short_desc: Switch to SimplePractice to streamline your marketing efforts with the Professional Website.
_source.long_desc: SimplePractice makes it easy to run your business by streamlining the business side of private practice. Send secure intakes, automate your billing, and create a simple, beautiful website, all in one place. The Professional Website by SimplePractice is fully integrated into your EHR, so you don't need to remember more logins or passwords. Plus, it's easy to update your practice information right from your account settings and connect with the clients who need you most.
_source.pricing_details: SimplePractice offers three plans, the Start Plan for $29 per month, the Essential Plan starting at $69 per month and the Plus Plan starting at $99 per month.  Visit simplepractice.com/pricing to see what features are available in each plan.
_source.target_audience: Health and wellness practitioners in private practice including therapists, psychologists, speech-language pathologists, occupational therapists, dietitians, massage therapists and many more.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.

Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: We deliver the tools to simplify and amplify digital marketing and drive results for your business.

Whether it's driving sales, growing a customer base or engaging an audience, we deliver the performance and guidance to build strong connections and generate powerful results. For more information, visit www.constantcontact.com.

related_products.short_desc: Just pick a template, then customize fonts, colors, and content to match your style.

Just create an account, pick a design and use the built-in editor to add your own images and text. You can make your website as simple or complex as you'd like. You can even add a full online store complete with product listings, coupons, shopping cart, shipping and multiple payment options.

related_products.short_desc: Start building your website Create a Free Account.
related_products.features: Websites 360?, It's Just Better - Build your own site today with our powerful website builder. We power over 20K companies. Our website platform was designed by experienced marketers with the sole purpose of driving sales at the highest possible rate. So not only is our website platform beautiful, but they generate unmatched results. White glove service is also available if you need it.

related_products.short_desc: Professional, code-free WordPress website builder. Build responsive, pixel-perfect sites using advanced widgets, templates, & features.
related_products.features:
Elementor is a free WordPress website builder for professional web creators that want to build amazing, code-free websites. 

With its advanced features, users can create high performing, responsive sites in a whole new and visual way. 

Our drag & drop interface allows users to design custom-made, pixel-perfect websites. It also works seamlessly with almost any WordPress theme or plugin, so you can continue to use your favorite tools. 

Join 11M+ happy Elementor users worldwide!

related_products.features: Bitrix24 is the leading free website builder for small businesses. Free unlimited pages, hosting, bandwidth, CRM and your own domain included. Used by over 8 million companies worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Tools for the modern professional: proposals, contracts, payments, and more.  Try 7 days free when you're ready.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook helps creative entrepreneurs and freelancers book more clients, manage projects and get paid all in one place. With our business management software, you can automate your busy work and stay on top of all your to-dos, saving time and money so you can grow your business. Its like your own personal assistant.

Small business owners and freelancers have used HoneyBook to increase their bookings and save time.

For your first 6 months, get HoneyBook for $1 per month with code ONLY1.

With features like unlimited push notifications, mobile food ordering, reservations, loyalty programs, and coupons our apps directly generate revenue and increase customer engagement.

related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.
